verses.name: Jeremiah 25:10
verses.text: Moreover I will take from them the voice of mirth, and the voice of gladness, the voice of the bridegroom, and the voice of the bride, the sound of the millstones, and the light of the candle.

verses.name: Jeremiah 25:11
verses.text: And this whole land shall be a desolation, and an astonishment; and these nations shall serve the king of Babylon seventy years.

verses.name: Jeremiah 25:12
verses.text: And it shall come to pass, when seventy years are accomplished, that I will punish the king of Babylon, and that nation, saith the Lord, for their iniquity, and the land of the Chaldeans, and will make it perpetual desolations.
